Project participants must adhere to the following conduct:

1. Follow the [contributor convenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/1/4/code-of-conduct.html)
2. When contributing information to TDS in code or discussions, do not include any sensitive information that may compromise
   yourself, or TELUS and its respective entities
3. When participating in issues, try to stay on topic. If you have a concern not directly related to an existing issue
   you are welcome to [report a new issue](https://github.com/telusdigital/tds/issues/new?template=defect_template.md)
   or [suggest a new feature](https://github.com/telusdigital/tds/issues/new?template=feature_template.md)
